data.message: Wow, since when do rappers (that we made famous) have the right to tell you how to vote?  These people obviously think that their opinions matter more than our own, so much so, that they can brain wash their fans politically....WOW, there's one thing that this election should have taught these pampered celebrities, NEVER UNDERESTIMATE THE AMERICAN PEOPLE!!  We can make or break you baby.  you've begun to think that because your rich and you make a more than comfortable living that you should dictate how your fans vote, well, I'm the silent majority you spoiled brat, and I will not choose who you want for president because I listened to your music.  you're obviously needing some attention, the world has actually been busy Eminem, ain't nobody got time for your drama

replies.message: when the freedom of speech people start tryna take rights away😂😂😂😂😂 girl you say hes pampered?? this man grew up in the shittiest conditions of the most abandoned working class town in america. hes a harder worker than youll ever be. We didnt make him famous he made him famous. Hes one of the most talented artists alive and if you dont see that than youre even more blind than most trump supporters
He didn't tell his fans how to vote. He told his fans that he doesn't want them as fans if they support Trump.

Didn't hear him say anything about how to vote. lol  He's brave enough to say what the rest of us are thinking. This administration is off the rails and Trump is an amoral excuse for a human.  We applaud Em.
And you had the time to write all this in your busy schedule.
Fuck trump supporters like Eminem said.
LOL he's a fucking drugged addict rapper.. He doesn't know what working hard is.. Sorry "chillin in the studio dropping beats" is not hard work..

^ HIT DOG HOLLERING ABOVE . HE USED TO BE A FAN UNTIL HE GOT THE FUCK YOU. He been listening to said drug addict this whole time until now but it just started becoming an issue lol.  Fake ass racist fans
Sounds like your writing about the President! Idiot!
Funny, you don't seem to care about the times he went after Bush or the Clintons.  He's always been loudly political.  Guess it only matters when you get disowned.
Lmao I know for a fact you didnt make him so please take your ass back to watching fox news.

Yeah because his talent had nothing to do with becoming famous 😂😂. 

Everyone has there own opinions it doesn't matter what other people think about others, as long as you believe in what you believe in. End of the day doesn't matter who you put into power they're still gonna fuck it up. England is up there too with this. But I think you should give the man a chance at least let him fuck up first before you slate him he deserves it as much as obama did.
Spencer Sweeting  😂😂😂 I think you will find it a lot harder than sitting there dropping beats
